alert.note: Alert for Brookings; Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 01 at 1:42PM MST until December 02 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 6 PM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, south winds around 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. For the second Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Brookings and Moody Counties. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 4 PM CST this afternoon. For the second Wind Advisory, from 10 AM to 6 PM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds coupled with falling snow Friday may result in periods of reduced visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
